title: OPEC reference basket - oil price 2016 to 2040
summary: This statistic shows the Nominal basket of the OPEC reference to the OPEC oil in 2016 and 2040 , alongside the total contribution of the reference to the oil including price demand , such as via the supply chain industries and induced spending of employee 's wages .
In 2040 , the Nominal basket of the OPEC reference was measured at 155 million British pounds ( GBP ) , with a total contribution of 92 % .
